      void Blender.attach(Arduino service)
      important "attach" method for Blender - this way MRL World notifies Blender to dynamically create "virtual" counterpart for device.
      boolean AdafruitMotorShield.attach(Arduino inArduino)
      an Arduino does not need to know about a shield but a shield must know about a Arduino Arduino owns the script, but a Shield needs additional support Shields are specific - but plug into a generalized Arduino Arduino shields can not be plugged into other uCs TODO - Program Version & Type injection - with feedback + query to load
